name: Run Little Zombie!!
description:
Comedy and horror have never merged so perfectly. Experience the best part of animation fun and horror.

References

1. Hospital Horror Pack: In this pack, we have 12 props: bad (152p); cable (192p); door (212p); doorway (32p); ElectroPanel (232p); lamp (35p); old cup ( 78); stretcher (570p); trolley (320p); wall (6p); Wall2 (30p); WallDoorway (10p); all prefabs.
Source: Unity Asset Store

2. Five Mario sound effects:
    2.1 All health/medicine/random medicine
    2.2 keys
    2.3 Player death
    2.4 Complete each level
    2.5 Complete all levels
